name: CTRify AI SEO Content
author: ExcursionPass Inc.

sections.description:
CTRify WordPress Plugin enables CTRify platform services on any website powered by WordPress. Among other things, it allows you to generate SEO Optimized Content generated by AI for your websites in seconds!

On the last update we included an new algorithm that prevents content to be detected as A.I. by all the most popular A.I. content detectors.

Start by creating a free account on https://www.ctrify.com. Then install our plugin and manage your content generation for all your WordPress website from the same interface using CTRify WordPress Manager.

Provide a keyword and CTRify AI will create a full website with SEO optimized content, contextual backlinks, and send organic traffic for AI-driven CTR optimization to boost your Google rankings organically.

Need hundreds of SEO Optimized keyword-rich posts to create internal links to your top money pages to increase their Google rankings? 4 clicks and less than 1 minute.

To generate content with CTRify WordPress Plugin is simple as writing a single keyword. Our AI will learn all about it and generate content according to the selected type of campaign.

Three simple options to get new content quickly:

  • Generate all Questions & Answers around one single keyword
  • Generate Posts by giving a list keywords
  • Generate Long Posts by giving clustered keywords or subtitles

You can get one license inside the CTRify Platform or on the CTRify WordPress Plugin page were you can read more details about the plugin, options and to. You can also create an account on our main platform CTRify SEO Platform and manage your content generation for all your WordPress website using CTRify Plugin from the same interface.

Some Results
sections.installation:
1. Open Plugins – Add New in WP admin and search for “CTRify”
  2. Install and activate the plugin
  3. Plugin settings will open automatically (you can also access them via Settings – CTRify)
  4. Get a License Key on CTRify SEO Plugin page and activate it. You can also create an account on our main platform CTRify SEO Platform and manage your content generation for all your wordpress website using CTRify Plugin from the same interface.

Need support?

We’re here for you! Things get frustrating when they don’t work so make sure you contact us using the contact information inside the plugin or well by open a support topic in the official forum. We answer all questions within a few hours!

Wanna say “thank you”?

The best way to say “thank you” is to leave a review. Reviews are what keeps the plugin going. Thank you!
sections.faq:
Who can I generate the Topical Map?

Topical Maps and high-quality 1000+ words articles covering semantically connected topics can be generated using our WordPress manager inside CTRify SEO Platform .

Who is this plugin for?

For anybody that needs to create keyword-rich content, with the idea of naturally linking internally other “money pages” in order to improve their rankings.

Do I need a powerful server to run this plugin?

No. You can install this plugin on any cheap shared hosting. All the heavy lift is done on our Cloud. The plugin handles the WordPress process of post creation, scheduling and campaigns control. The high demanding and expensive processes are done on our cloud.

After activating CTRify plugin, do I need to do anything else?

Yes, you will need to get one license key and activate that key to fully activate the plugin. Licenses act as secure keys that ensure communications with our servers in order to process the high load processes of the AI work.

How good is the generated Content?

The generated content is as good as other AI content generated by similars AIs, lets say OpenAI GPT-4 or GPT-3. It will never replace a professional copy writer on style. But will for sure surpass human capabilities of research and content creation. Humans may rather prefer human-written content, but for SEO others AIs like Google´s will like our content as well. Ideally is recommended to write as better content as possible in order to convert your visitors to sales, or actions. AI-generated content helps you to start receiving traffic by indexing content faster. But is recommended that you monitor your visits in order to locate the most visited content and optimize it for your desired conversion needs.

short_description: Generate SEO Optimized content from a single keyword or even answering given questions with one-click! Now integrated also with OpenAI.
